title: Auto file organizer for Google Drive: sort PDFs, images & documents by type
description:
**Description:**

This ready-to-deploy n8n automation template smartly detects and classifies files uploaded to a specified Google Drive folder based on MIME type. It automatically moves each file into its correct destination folder: Documents, PDFs, or Images ‚Äî ensuring a clean and organized Drive, effortlessly.

Perfect for remote teams, admins, educators, legal pros, and automation-focused operations, this workflow eliminates manual sorting and saves hours of repetitive work.

**What This Template Does (Step-by-Step)**

‚öôÔ∏èManual Trigger: Launch the workflow on demand using the "Execute Workflow" trigger.

üìÅ Search Files in Source Folder (Google Drive): Lists all files inside your chosen folder (e.g., "Uploads").

üîÅ Loop Over Files (SplitInBatches): Iterates through each file one-by-one to ensure reliability.

üì• Download File (Google Drive): Retrieves file metadata and MIME type required for filtering.

üß† Smart File Type Detection via If Nodes
- application/json ‚Üí Move to Documents folder
- application/pdf ‚Üí Move to PDFs folder
- image/jpeg ‚Üí Move to Images folder
(Easily customizable to support additional types like PNG, DOCX, etc.)

üìÇ Move Files to Designated Folders: Uses Google Drive API to relocate each file to its proper location.

üîÅ Loop Returns for Next File
After each move, the loop picks the next file in queue.

**Key Features**

‚öôÔ∏è Google Drive API v3 Integration
üîê OAuth2 for secure access
üìÑ MIME-type‚Äìbased routing logic
üîÅ Batch-safe with looping logic
‚úÖ File properties are preserved
üîÑ Auto-removal from source after sorting

**Required Integration**
Google Drive (OAuth2)

**Use Cases**

- Auto-organize client uploads
- Separate scanned PDFs, images, or forms
- Route invoices, receipts, or contracts into folders
- Automatically sort uploaded assignments or resources
- Maintain structured cloud storage without manual intervention

**Why Use This Template?**

‚úÖ No-code deployment
‚úÖ Saves hours of manual work
‚úÖ Works across teams, departments, or shared Drives
‚úÖ Easy to expand with more file types or routing rules
‚úÖ Keeps your Drive clean, fast, and organized
disclaimer: This workflow is provided as-is. Please review and test before using in production.
